metadata.title: CVE-2015-8771 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The generate_smb_nt_hash function in include/functions.inc in GOsa allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a crafted password.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8771` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gosa - 2.7.4+reloaded2-9ubuntu1
gosa-desktop - 2.7.4+reloaded2-9ubuntu1
gosa-help-de - 2.7.4+reloaded2-9ubuntu1

criterions.comment: gosa package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.4+reloaded2-9ubuntu1').
